p: The viability assay was used to determine the effect of ethyl acetate crude extracts from Phyllosticta sp. YGE41. The result demonstrated that the ethyl acetate extracts from both Phyllosticta sp. YGE41 and Garcinia cowa affected biosensor cell viability ( Figure 5 and Figure 7). The viability of the biosensor treated with Phyllosticta sp. YGE4 ethyl acetate crude extract was reduced to 74%, 14%, and 0.02% when the cells were treated at 20, 40, and 80 μg/mL, respectively ( Figure 7). We selected 10 μg/mL to further investigate DNA damage and repair activity at the molecular level.
